phrases.original: After you have shared your faith with an interested person, you need to stay in touch by following up with them.
phrases.translated: After you have shared your faith with an interested person, you need to stay in touch by following up with them.

phrases.original: Every invite recipient has a profile page in your account where you can do all of your follow up. Never again lose anyone's contact information.  Make phone calls, send text messages, take notes and schedule follow-ups, all from one convenient place.
phrases.translated: Every invite recipient has a profile page in your account where you can do all of your follow up. Never again lose anyone's contact information.  Make phone calls, send text messages, take notes and schedule follow-ups, all from one convenient place.

phrases.original: Whenever a recipient views their invitation, you will be notified (via e-mail and/or push message). This will enable you to follow up with them in a timely manner.  This can happen at any time, even months or years after you first invited them.  In this way, you will be making the most of every opportunity to follow up, so that no one you invite will ever be forgotten or overlooked.
phrases.translated: Whenever a recipient views their invitation, you will be notified (via e-mail and/or push message). This will enable you to follow up with them in a timely manner. phrases.original: Every follow up profile page is secure. The Invites App uses digital encryption to safeguard both (A) the invite recipient's contact info, and (B) your notes.  This information is encrypted on your device (not on the server) before it ever gets backed up to the server in its encrypted form. The encryption is done in such a way that no one can decrypt and read the information except you, the very person to whom the recipient disclosed their contact info in the first place. Even the administrators and owners of this app are unable to decrypt this private information, and that is by design.

phrases.original: Share your Faith, Even When Time is Limited:
phrases.translated: Share your Faith, Even When Time is Limited:

phrases.original: Share all of the event's details to the invitee's device instantly, freeing you to use a brief moment to build rapport instead of fixating on details. The whole interaction can take place within one minute.
phrases.translated: Share all of the event's details to the invitee's device instantly, freeing you to use a brief moment to build rapport instead of fixating on details. The whole interaction can take place within one minute.

phrases.original: Leverage the power of calendar reminders to help invitees remember to attend, even when their device does not have a signal.
phrases.translated: Leverage the power of calendar reminders to help invitees remember to attend, even when their device does not have a signal.

phrases.original: Never again forget or overlook anyone you've invited. Make all of your follow-up calls and texts. Take notes. Create follow-up reminders to yourself, all from one convenient place.
phrases.translated: Never again forget or overlook anyone you've invited. Make all of your follow-up calls and texts. Take notes. Create follow-up reminders to yourself, all from one convenient place.

phrases.original: Use digital maps to plan your local outreach, maximizing your likelihood of meeting open people.
phrases.translated: Use digital maps to plan your local outreach, maximizing your likelihood of meeting open people.

phrases.original: If you lead a group within the church (whether a Bible Talk or even a world sector) you can easily equip your entire membership with access to the Invites App.
phrases.translated: If you lead a group within the church (whether a Bible Talk or even a world sector) you can easily equip your entire membership with access to the Invites App.
